snippet: The announcement that Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin would return as president dealt a heavy blow to President Dmitri A. Medvedev’s profile, suggesting that he meekly stepped away from a position he badly wanted.
abstract: Pres Dmitri A Medvedev of Russia is fighting to remain politically relevant as he prepares to cede the presidency to Prime Min Vladimir V Putin.
lead_paragraph: The announcement that Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin would return as president dealt a heavy blow to President Dmitri A. Medvedev’s profile, suggesting that he meekly stepped away from a position he badly wanted.

headline.seo: Leaving Presidency, Russia’s Medvedev Fights for Relevance
headline.main: Leaving the Presidency in Russia, Medvedev Fights for Relevance
headline.print_headline: Leaving the Presidency in Russia, Medvedev Fights for Relevance
